object.script:
function onTick() rot = input.getNumber(1) - 0.25
degrees = (rot - math.floor(rot)) * 360 degreesShadow = degrees - 20
rad = math.rad(degrees) radShadow = math.rad(degreesShadow)
output.setNumber(30, rad) end
function onDraw() w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight()
if (w < h) then radius = w/2 else radius = h/2 end
triangleX1 = w/2 triangleY1 = h/2 triangleX2 = w/2 + radius * math.cos(rad) triangleY2 = h/2 + radius * math.sin(rad) triangleX3 = w/2 + radius * math.cos(radShadow) triangleY3 = h/2 + radius * math.sin(radShadow)
lineX1 = w/2 lineY1 = h/2 lineX2 = w/2 + radius * math.cos(rad) lineY2 = h/2 + radius * math.sin(rad)
screen.setColor(0, 75, 0) screen.drawTriangleF(triangleX1, triangleY1, triangleX2, triangleY2, triangleX3, triangleY3) screen.setColor(0, 200, 0) screen.drawLine(lineX1, lineY1, lineX2, lineY2) screen.setColor(0, 255, 0) screen.drawCircle(w / 2, h / 2, radius) screen.drawCircle(w / 2, h / 2, radius+1) end

counter = 1 timeToStay = 13 tickTime = 0 currentTime = 0 secondsPerDay = 86400 lasttf1 = false lasttf2 = false --number of active targets, target expiration time, distance, rad targets = {}
function colorDim(currentTime, endTime) startTime = endTime - timeToStay
currentTime = currentTime - startTime endTime = endTime - startTime
return currentTime / endTime end
function addTarget(time, distance, rad) targets[counter] = {time, distance, rad} counter = counter + 1 end
function removeTarget(index) targets[index] = nil end
function onTick()
tickTime = tickTime + 1 if (tickTime >= 60) then currentTime = currentTime + 1 tickTime = 0 end tf1 = input.getBool(1) td1 = input.getNumber(1) aa1 = input.getNumber(2) ea1 = input.getNumber(3) tsd1 = input.getNumber(4)
tf2 = input.getBool(2) td2 = input.getNumber(5) aa2 = input.getNumber(6) ea2 = input.getNumber(7) tsd2 = input.getNumber(8)
rad = input.getNumber(31) range = input.getNumber(32)
output.setBool(1, tf1) output.setBool(2, tf2)
if (tf1 and not lasttf1) then addTarget(currentTime + timeToStay, td1, rad) end if (tf2 and not lasttf2) then addTarget(currentTime + timeToStay, td2, rad) end
lasttf1 = tf1 lasttf2 = tf2 end
function onDraw() w = screen.getWidth() h = screen.getHeight()
if (w < h) then radius = w/2 else radius = h/2 end
for k, v in pairs(targets) do if targets[k][1] > currentTime then x1 = w/2 + ((targets[k][2] / range) * radius) * math.cos(targets[k][3]) y1 = h/2 + ((targets[k][2] / range) * radius) * math.sin(targets[k][3])
screen.setColor(175, 0, 0, 255 - 255 * colorDim(currentTime, targets[k][1])) screen.drawCircleF(x1, y1, radius * 0.05) screen.setColor(25, 0, 0, 255 - 255 * colorDim(currentTime, targets[k][1])) screen.drawCircleF(x1, y1, radius * 0.05 + 1) screen.setColor(255, 255, 255) screen.drawText(x1, y1, k) else removeTarget(k) end end
end
